name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Consulting Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development, I bring expertise in **Java**, **Python**, and **JavaScript**, along with a deep understanding of **API** integration and **Big Data** technologies. My skills in **Data Modeling**, **Analytics**, and **graph database** solutions enable me to deliver insightful and data-driven applications that meet client needs.

I have a strong foundation in **DevOps** practices, utilizing CI/CD automation for streamlined deployment processes. I thrive in **Agile** environments and excel in **mentoring** teams through complex problem-solving scenarios. My background includes significant experience in the healthcare and financial sectors, where I have led projects that align with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Driven by collaboration and teamwork, I am committed to creating high-performance solutions that integrate seamlessly with enterprise systems. My technical prowess further extends to **machine learning** and deploying predictive analytics to enhance business intelligence.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **API** development skills to architect and develop scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms employing **Python** (FastAPI) and **JavaScript** technologies including **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and modern front-end frameworks like **React** (17-18), **Next.js**, and **Vue** (3.x), ensuring strict compliance with regulatory standards (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR, PCI DSS, SOX).

Applied **DevOps** practices to implement mobile-specific CI/CD pipelines with **Fastlane** and **App Center**, integrating automated testing, release management, and crash/error analytics using **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.

Led the re-architecture of monolithic applications into microservices-based ecosystems, leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes** (AKS/EKS), and serverless architectures (**AWS Lambda**, **Azure Functions**) to ensure high availability and fault tolerance in line with an **Agile** development approach.

Designed and maintained cloud-native data architectures utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, optimizing for large-scale healthcare and financial big data ingestion, storage, and querying.

Engaged in consulting to design and deploy machine learning models for patient risk prediction and financial fraud detection with **Python** libraries (**scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, **TensorFlow**), integrating real-time inference services into the backend.

Constructed MLOps pipelines utilizing **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow** for continuous training, validation, and deployment of models in both development and production environments.

Integrated AI-based features into client-facing applications, such as smart financial dashboards and personalized health recommendations, supported by trained models and APIs hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.

Implemented advanced data analytics solutions delivering complex financial data visualization tools with **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling real-time insights on transaction trends, fraud detection, and operational KPIs.

Collaborated with data scientists to integrate NLP models using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers** for healthcare document parsing and financial anomaly detection, embedding these into core services via RESTful APIs.

Established comprehensive testing strategies leveraging **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman**, ensuring extensive coverage including unit, integration, E2E, and contract testing.

Integrated search capabilities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, facilitating advanced search across **millions** of unstructured and structured health records and financial documents.

• Developed and optimized APIs for financial platforms, enhancing data modeling and analytics capabilities to support high-volume transactions using **Python** and **Java**.
• Led the integration of **GraphDatabase** for efficient data storage and retrieval, enabling advanced analytical queries on financial data and improving performance by **30%**.
• Facilitated Agile development practices, promoting teamwork and collaboration among cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and improve product features based on consumer feedback.
• Spearheaded the deployment and management of applications using DevOps practices, resulting in a **25%** reduction in deployment times and enhanced reliability of operations.
• Conducted consulting sessions to troubleshoot complex problems, leveraging strong problem-solving skills to devise strategic solutions that improved system performance and user experience.
• Mentored junior engineers on best practices in **BigData** processing and analytics, fostering a culture of continuous learning within the team.
• Actively engaged in team meetings and project planning sessions, contributing insights and strategies that improved overall project quality and execution.
• Designed and implemented data models to support real-time analytics, integrating various data sources into scalable frameworks.
• Utilized **C#** and **JavaScript** in developing enterprise-level applications that met stringent industry compliance standards, ensuring data integrity and security.

Utilized **Python** for backend services, demonstrating deep knowledge of **GraphDatabase** and **API** integrations to design and optimize solutions for a global e-commerce platform.
Developed high-performance applications employing **Java** and **JavaScript** frameworks such as **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **React** (18), ensuring robustness and agility in engineering effective user interactions.
Adopted Agile methodologies while collaborating within cross-functional teams, applying strong **ProblemSolving** skills to deliver scalable solutions for key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Engineered event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to support real-time order updates, enhancing responsiveness for up to **100,000** concurrent users.
Employed **BigData** techniques along with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Cassandra to effectively manage and store vast datasets, ensuring fast data access within high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Integrated AI/ML algorithms with **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to refine product recommendations, achieving a **20%** increase in conversion rates through personalized experiences.
Implemented CI/CD practices and DevOps strategies using **Kubernetes** for scalable application deployments and managed risk through feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly**.
Built user-centric e-commerce interfaces with **Next.js** and **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, optimizing them for SEO and mobile engagement, adhering to accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
Executed secure payment processing workflows integrating **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with PCI standards while handling sensitive financial data.
Facilitated user security by applying role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, enhancing data protection and aligning with GDPR regulations.
